message_1: A student needs to catch a train from Station A to Station B. The train departs from Station A every 30 minutes starting at 6:00 am until 10:00 pm. It takes exactly 40 minutes for the train to travel from Station A to Station B. The student arrives at Station A at 7:15 am. What is the earliest time the student can catch the train to arrive at Station B before 9:00 am?
message_2: The student arrives at Station A at 7:15 am. The train departs every 30 minutes, so the next train will depart at 7:30 am. It takes 40 minutes to travel from Station A to Station B, so the student will arrive at Station B at 8:10 am (7:30 am + 40 minutes). This is the earliest time the student can catch the train to arrive at Station B before 9:00 am.
